author: werken
msg: Modified TaskTag to call through ant's normal property-resolution

author: jstrachan
msg: Added the registration of some beanutils Converters for standard Ant type coercions, like File and Reference, and removed the temporary hacks in the setAttribute() methods.
So now coercions should work cleanly in Ant tasks. This should certainly fix bob's coercion problem he found when using <ant:property file="foo.properties"/>

author: werken
msg: The <core:include> tag now can tag 2 additional attributes:
inhert="(true|false)" which describes that the included
jellyscript inherits all variables from the one that
export="(true|false)" which describes that the included
jellyscript exports all of its locally-set variables
to the one that actually uses the <include>.

author: jstrachan
msg: Patched the <forEach> tag to properly handle the being and step attributes to miss out items in the collection.
